1.title: Underwater Jetski
1.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The jet ski submarine breaching the sea. The vinyl record re-revolution taking over the recording industry. The soccer ball creating electricity in underdeveloped nations. And, the invention safely removing creepy crawly things from your home.

2.title: Pony Play
2.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: Horses having a ball. The artists who create our fonts. The headphones helping us sleep at night. And, lighting off the grid homes with soda bottles.

3.title: Football Robot
3.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: College innovators tackling a heady problem. The watchmaking school keeping us ticking. Unshrinking sweaters accidentally washed. And, the Doomsday Seed Vault insuring the world's future.

4.title: Balancing Rocks
4.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The artist balancing boulders. The 10 second Spielberg of viral videos. The future of tube travel. And, streaming sweetness from a sticky spigot.

5.title: Wheelchairs for Pets
5.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The family making the wheels for disabled pets. Staying in touch when phones don't work. Raising funds for your inventions. And, using sound waves to put out fires.

6.title: Wrist Concert Lights
6.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The wristband lights that have become part of concert entertainment. The Girls App Camp teaching tech. The travel jacket with a pocket for everything. And, the mom down under lighting your throat.

7.title: Correcting Color Blindness
7.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The glasses allowing the color blind to see colors. The teen inventors of the Smart Steering Wheel. 3D printing clothes. And, the movie actress who helped invent how we communicate.

8.title: Animal Movie Magic
8.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The movie makers safely putting animal in films. The briefcase scooter getting you to your meeting on time. The technology helping you raise your baby. And, removing plastic from our oceans.

9.title: Bowling Ball Math Lesson
9.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The original video doorbell connected to your smartphone. A garage full of engineers creating a self driving car kit. Teaching the science of gravity with bowling balls. And, the water roller saving time and necks in Africa.

10.title: Sit With Us App
10.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: An app that allows teens in school to find lunchtime friends. The new clothing fabric that can charge your phone. The jet powered surfboard. And, robotic birds making airports safer.

11.title: Football Fever
11.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The overhead stadium camera giving you a birds eye view of the game. The TV magic showing the first down line. The highest tech stadium in the game. And, the mouth guard aimed at preventing concussion injuries.

12.title: Monster Video Walls
12.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The video artists giving us massive projections. Earbuds that filter out what you don't want to hear. Scientists growing lungs in a lab. And, a teen trio speeding up seedlings.

13.title: Honey Invention
13.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The jet ski submarine breaching the sea. The artist balancing boulders. Horses having a ball. And, streaming sweetness from a sticky spigot.

14.title: Fire Gel
14.plot: Host Alie Ward shows us: The firefighting gel dousing the flames. Repelling sharks with a magnetic field. The tech helping park. And, the Bluetooth toothbrush keeping your mouth clean.

imdb.plot outline: Alie Ward brings viewers fascinating stories of invention while shining a light on everyday innovators. With each episode, Alie will present reports of human ingenuity and inspiration from around the United States and in some cases, around the world. Viewers will learn about innovators young and old, what it takes to bring their vision to life, and little-known facts about the history and process of invention and innovation.
imdb.title: Did I Mention Invention?
plot: Alie Ward brings viewers fascinating stories of invention while shining a light on everyday innovators. With each episode, Alie will present reports of human ingenuity and inspiration from around the United States and in some cases, around the world. Viewers will learn about innovators young and old, what it takes to bring their vision to life, and little-known facts about the history and process of invention and innovation.
